text: The sun is hot. The endless desert stretches endlessly. You are running and you don’t remember why. In your hands, you are holding a heavy tome. Its cracked, hide-bound cover is unnaturally cold, the only cold thing in this dusty landscape.
Behind you, two men are running towards you with swords drawn. They look angry.
Despite the suffocating heat muddying your thoughts, you tell yourself that you must come up with a plan.

buttons.label: Turn around and fight them off
Turn around and try to talk your way out

text: You turn around and wait for them to come. Although you are unarmed and your two assailants have swords, you feel calm…almost eager. They approach you warily, and you can see the fear in their eyes. You leap at them.
Stop the flickering bar within the center.
You disarm the first swordsman, but the second one slashes you in the arm, cutting open an artery. The two attackers back away and watch you slowly bleed out and die.
